text.text_translated:
Ed could not walk without technology.  
He had a radio.  
He had the radio to ask big forest people for food.  
He also asked them for permission to cross their land.  
Many people met him.  
They guided him through the hardest ground.  
While walking, Ed wrote a blog.  
He wrote about his daily experiences.  
Many people heard about his trip.  
He told them it was bad that the big forest was hurt.  
He asked them to give money to charity groups.  
The charity groups help nature.  
The charity groups also help children.  
The groups are in Brazil and Peru.
